https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yTuBhUPaeTW5x695KkCtXMz15SU.jpg This film is about human alienation in a consumerist society. Nowadays man surrounded by modern industry tools founds himself solitary. He seeks his way out of the routine and enforced life norms but all he meets is a dead-end. Absurd People
